thread.title: Joe Montana says letting Jim Harbaugh go was a mistake
thread.title_full: Joe Montana says letting Jim Harbaugh go was a mistake

author: Bay Area News Group
title: Joe Montana says letting Jim Harbaugh go was a mistake
text:
Joe Montana says letting Jim Harbaugh go was a mistake Bay Area News Group Posted: 10/15/2015 05:39:35 PM PDT Updated: 10/15/2015 05:39:36 PM PDT JOE MONTANA: LETTING JIM HARBAUGH GO WAS A MISTAKE 49ers legend Joe Montana says the decision to let Jim Harbaugh go wasn't a wise move. 
Montana was on "The Herd with Colin Cowherd" on FOXSportsRadio.com Thursday and was asked if the move was a mistake. 
"Well, I think so. I mean, honestly, here's a guy that's been very successful for you, quickly," Montana said. "He put a good team together, and now he's out of there. Now they're struggling, players are leaving. Is that Harbaugh's fault? I don't think so, he's not there anymore. Where those troubles begin and why those guys left? Even, I think, people close to the team really don't know." 
And he has some advice for Colin Kaepernick. 
"Beg the coaches and the offense to go back to letting him play the game that he knows," Montana said. "He's big, he's strong, as long as he's protecting himself, let him get out of there (the pocket)'. Because in the pocket, decisions have to be made quicker, anticipation, that's not where he made his living for the longest time ..." Advertisement
